title.rendered: Ad Tech Simplified : Ad Tech Terms You Should Know

content.rendered:
The mobile Ad Tech ecosystem is a complex landscape with many different terms and jargons which makes it more confusing.
 
Ad tech simplified is a new series of articles authored by the GreedyGame team with a view to explaining jargon from the digital advertising industry in layman terms. Whether you’re simply interested to know more about this topic or keen to monetize your offering these insights may prove helpful in learning more about this industry.
 
For today’s installment, we’ll see what are the major ad tech terms.
 
 
#Adtech #Adnetwork #DSP #Supplysideplatform #eCPM
